thread.title: BRIEF-CAE Reports Third Quarter Fiscal 2018 Results

title: BRIEF-CAE Reports Third Quarter Fiscal 2018 Results
text:
37 PM / in 9 minutes BRIEF-CAE Reports Third Quarter Fiscal 2018 Results   CAE Inc: * CAE REPORTS THIRD QUARTER FISCAL 2018 RESULTS * Q3 EARNINGS PER SHARE C$0.28 EXCLUDING ITEMS * Q3 EARNINGS PER SHARE C$0.44 FROM CONTINUING OPERATIONS * Q3 REVENUE C$704.4 MILLION VERSUS C$682.7 MILLION * REMAINS ON TRACK TO DELIVER ON GROWTH OUTLOOK 
* Q3 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW C$0.27, REVENUE VIEW C$731.8 MILLION -- THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S 
* EXPECTS LOWER CAPITAL INTENSITY IN FISCAL 2018, WITH TOTAL CAPITAL EXPENDITURES EXPECTED TO BE IN RANGE OF $150 MILLION 
* QUARTER END TOTAL BACKLOG $7,368.3 MILLION VERSUS $7,393.1 MILLION AT Q3 END 2017 * MANAGEMENT OUTLOOK FOR FISCAL 2018 UNCHANGED 
* FY2018 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW C$1.06, REVENUE VIEW C$2.86 BILLION -- THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S Source text for Eikon:
